## Reading:

### Required Reading (everyone):

* Handout: [Jonathan Gilligan, "Introduction to Reproducible Research"](/downloads/reproducible_research/index.html){target="_blank"}.
* Handout: [Jonathan Gilligan, "Citations and Bibliographies in Quarto"](/downloads/cite-bib-quarto/index.html){target="_blank"}.

### Optional Extra Reading:

* Handout: [Lenny Teytelman, "No More Excuses for Non-Reproducible Methods," _Nature_ **560**, 411 (2018), [doi:10.1038/d41586-018-06008-w](https://doi.org/10.1038/d41586-018-06008-w)](/downloads/no-more-excuses/index.html){target="_blank"}.
